from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from datetime import datetime, date
from tqdm import tqdm
import pandas as pd

spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
start_date = datetime(year=start_year, month=start_month, day=1)
end_date = datetime(year=end_year, month=end_month, day=1)

dates = pd.date_range(start_date, end_date, freq='MS').strftime("%Y-%m-%d").tolist()

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 60
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_delete_table_contents', timeout_in_seconds, arguments={"db_name": "odw_harmonised_db", "table_name": "hr_record_fact"})

for date in tqdm(dates):
    print(f"Processing: {date}")
    mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/sap-hr-views-saphr', timeout_in_seconds, arguments={"expected_from": date})
    mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_record_fact', timeout_in_seconds)

# mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/sap-hr-views-saphr', timeout_in_seconds, arguments={"expected_from": "2021-01-01T00:00:00.000000"})
